snippet: The airline said that delivery of its first Airbus A380 would be delayed by three months as it waited for modifications to the superjumbo’s wing following a cracking problem.
abstract: Qatar Airways says that delivery of its first Airbus A380 will be delayed by three months as it awaits modifications to the superjumbo jet's wings to resolve a cracking problem identified this year; Qatar Airways has placed orders for eight A380s and options for five more, with delivery dates extending to 2019.
lead_paragraph: The airline said that delivery of its first Airbus A380 would be delayed by three months as it waited for modifications to the superjumbo’s wing following a cracking problem.

headline.seo: Qatar Airways Delays Delivery of Airbus Jets Over Wing Cracks
headline.main: Qatar Airways Delays Jet Delivery Over Wing Cracks
headline.print_headline: Qatar Airways Delays Jet Delivery Over Wing Cracks
